sourcesContent: import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; const RemoveCartModal = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <> Remove from cart? Just a heads up! Woohoo, you're reading this text in a modal! ) } export default RemoveCartModal
